data.meta_description: Obituary for David Vickers | David Lee Vickers, 57 of Trimble was found in his home on February 23, 2012. Born November 17, 1954 in Elyria, he was the son of the late Louis Marvin Vickers and Estell Vickers...
data.meta_site_name: David Vickers Obituary | February 23, 2012 | Morrison Funeral Chapel - Glouster, OH
data.text:
Coping with Grief

We would like to offer our sincere support to anyone coping with grief. Enter your email below for our complimentary daily grief messages. Messages run for up to one year and you can stop at any time. Your email will not be used for any other purpose.
